name: Roza Eskenazi
description: '''Roza Eskenazi''' (mid-1890s – 2 December 1980, Greek: Ρόζα Εσκενάζυ) was a Jewish-Greek dancer and singer of ''[[rebetiko]]'', [[Greek folk music]], [[Kanto (music)|Kanto]] and [[Turkish folk music]] born in [[Istanbul]], whose recording and stage career extended from the late 1920s into the 1970s.
